title: 72. Fireside with the Underboss - "I Think It's Time For Me To Quit & Walk Away"
description: Sammy tells us about the time he tried to start a new life, a life with zero mob involvement. Under the stains of working as a carpenter day in and day out, Sammy decides he just can't take it anymore.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy tells us about the time he tried to start a new life, a life with zero mob involvement. Under the stains of working as a carpenter day in and day out, Sammy decides he just can't take it anymore.
